mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL( complaint_main_detail_id, complaint_main_id, complaint_mode, visitor_name, visitor_mobile, visitor_date, visitor_number, patient_relation, is_major, other_type, summary_of_disputes, appeal, reception_employee, reception_date, next_link, next_link_man, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{complaintMainDetailId}, #{complaintMainId}, #{complaintMode}, #{visitorName}, #{visitorMobile}, #{visitorDate}, #{visitorNumber}, #{patientRelation}, #{isMajor}, #{otherType}, #{summaryOfDisputes}, #{appeal}, #{receptionEmployee}, #{receptionDate}, #{nextLink}, #{nextLinkMan}, #{createUser}, #{createDate}, #{updateUser}, #{updateDate}, 0 )
